name: Recruitment / job
decs: Hire employees by advertising in newspapers under the subcategory like situation vacant, multiple vacancies, situation abroad etc.

name: Metrimonial
decs: Book Wanted Bride/Groom ads by picking specific sub-categories like caste, religion, community, language.

name: Obituary (Death)
decs: Book Obituary ads of your loved ones to convey the news of death among your friends and relatives.

name: Property Sale
decs: Book Obituary ads of your loved ones to convey the news of death among your friends and relatives.

name: Business
decs: For offering business proposals, place your ads under the sub-categories like agents & agencies, business offers, franchisee, etc.

name: Education
decs: Advertise professional courses, distance education,abroad courses in different formats in leading newspapers.

name: Astrology
decs: Book astrology ads under various sub-categories which includes numerologist, palmistry, poojas, personal problems etc.

name: Lost & Found
decs: Have you lost any important document? For e.g marksheets, certificates, admit cards etc. then place an ad in this category.

name: Tender / Notice
decs: Book tender ads and auction ads under this category.

name: Name Change
decs: Book change of name ads under this category to inform corcerned authorities about the change in your new name.

name: Vehical Sale
decs: Buy or Sell your vehicles by placing ads under a particular subcategory to get more responses.
